project_goal: Build a FAR-103 legal Easy Riser ultralight. This airplane does not require an airworthiness certificate and may be flown by an unlicensed pilot.

project_leaders.name: Luke Wagner
project_leaders.bio: Luke is a freshman interested in aviation and engineering. He enjoys camping, canoeing, and anything related to the outdoors.

project_leaders.name: Peter Wagner
project_leaders.bio: Peter is a senior in physics and is the current president of Tesla Works. His fascinations include canoeing, juggling, chess, and aviation.
